"I have a feeling of security Margaret W - Newington Find out more Our Philosophy Future Funds Pty Ltd prides itself on building lifetime relationships with clients based on mutual respect and sustainable operations. We are held in the highest respect by members of our community. Through honesty, diligence and commitment, we strive to attain mutual respect with all those we interact with. We value this as the central requirement for all long term relationships. Our Team Get to know the key members of our professional and experienced team. Our Product Providers Our approved product list is drawn from a broad range of fund managers. It includes those funds we believe are the best in each major asset class – Australian shares, global shares, listed property, fixed interest and cash. It incorporates a core selection of high profile fund managers together with some specialist boutique funds selected to meet specific client needs.  We conduct rigorous analysis to identify the most skilled and consistently high performing fund managers in each asset class and each fund manager is reviewed regularly to ensure it continues to meet our criteria.
